title: Which are the best five science institutes of England? - Quora
tags: Colleges and Universities in the United Kingdom

response.answer_text: Thanks for the A2A. I have researched a table listing the ranks of the top 7 most popular universities in England, based on their QS rankings and Times Higher education rank. Here it is:  Source: Yocket’s Country Guide for Study in the United Kingdom If you are looking for more specific information on the above-mentioned Universities, I suggest you check out Yocket’s microsites for them and view the requirements, course-fees, scholarships offered and their requirement, information on the University location, weather, Alumni as well as future prospects. Hope this helps. All the best!
